page.title: 18Churches and Chapels
page.content: There is one church and three chapels in our block. The church is called St Columba's Church and is next to the school in Warcop. There is a chapel which belongs to the church at Blea tarn. The vicar is Rev. Peter Norton, and he comes into school to take assembly and work with the junior class once a week. Sometimes the school puts on a service in the church. There is a Wesleyan chapel in Warcop and one in Blea tarn, made of corrugated tin. Mr Peter Robinson is the minister. The chapel holds a Sunday School, run by Mrs Burton, who drives the school taxi. There's also the Band of Hope which meets in the chapel. Each summer there is a Band of Hope demonstration at Appleby football field.
